code: import axios from"axios";var API=axios.create({baseURL:""});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem("ews")){req.headers.authorization=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("ews"));}return req;});export var contact=function contact(formData){return API.post("/contact",formData);};export var email=function email(formData){return API.post("/email",formData);};export var getemails=function getemails(){return API.get("/emails");};export var sendemail=function sendemail(formData){return API.post("/sendemails",formData);};export var auth=function auth(formData){return API.post("/auth",formData);};// shreeram
